lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Dodgers reached a record contract Saturday with starting pitcher Zack Greinke, agreeing to a six-year, $147 million deal.
snippet: The Los Angeles Dodgers reached a record contract Saturday with starting pitcher Zack Greinke, agreeing to a six-year, $147 million deal.
